common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Add model. More detail please check: https://open.shopee.com/developer-guide/219

error_list.description: Invalid stock location ID

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not update item with different stock structure. Can only update seller stock with location id when existing seller stock have location id. Can only update seller stock without location id when existing seller stock without location id.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not update item with stock less than reserve stock

error_list.name: error_busi
error_list.description: The merchant/shop has multi warehouse, please input location id

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Stock should be larger than reserved stock.

error_list.description: Invalid parameter for product.

error_list.name: error_system_busy
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_nil_shopid_or_itemid
error_list.description: Query information failed.

error_list.name: error_holiday_on_add_item
error_list.description: Shop is under vocation mode.

error_list.name: error_nil_name_new_item_model
error_list.description: Item tier_variation name cannot be empty.

error_list.name: error_price_exceed_min_limitt
error_list.description: Original_price is less than min price limit.

error_list.name: error_price_exceed_max_limitt
error_list.description: Original_price is bigger than max price limit.

error_list.name: error_wholesale_price_less_than_ratio_limit
error_list.description: Wholesale price is less than ratio limit.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not update item with different stock structure. Can only update seller stock with location id when existing seller stock have location id. Can only update seller stock without location id when existing seller stock without location id.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_slash_price_nomodel_to_models_lock
error_list.description: In slash sale, can't add model.

error_list.name: error_price_should_be_same_for_wholesales
error_list.description: All model price should be the same when the item has been set wholesales.

new stock info for model（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

location id, you can get the location id from v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail api, if seller don't have any warehouse, you don't need to upload this field.

","name":"location_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"WHnnMXr"},{"description":"

stock

","name":"stock","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"RYnnCsz"}]},{"description":"

- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as \"00\".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule\" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or \"00\" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, \"00\" or be omitted entirely.

","name":"gtin_code","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"SPXmSnD"},{"description":"

The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

","name":"weight","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":"False","key":"fxSFXRD"},{"description":"

The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

","name":"dimension","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"fjskrDs","children":[{"description":"

The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

","name":"package_height","sample":"11","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"aMbEJBM"},{"description":"

","name":"package_length","sample":"11","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"eriWNSa"},{"description":"

","name":"package_width","sample":"11","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"GZjHBiZ"}]},{"description":"

If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

","name":"pre_order","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"zdBaeYc","children":[{"description":"
